original_text: But Christ serves in God's house as a son, not as a servant. He is the leader of God's people today. And we are God's people. We belong to his house if we continue to believe in Christ. We must be brave. We must continue to show people clearly that we trust God. He will do what he has promised to do.
korean_text: 그리스도는 하나님의 집을 맡은 아들로서 그와 같이 하셨으니 우리가 소망의 확신과 자랑을 끝까지 굳게 잡고 있으면 우리는 그의 집이라

sentences.original_text: But Christ serves in God's house as a son,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그리스도는 하나님의 집에서 아들로서 섬기며,

sentences.original_text: He is the leader of God's people today.
We belong to his house if we continue to believe in Christ.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 그리스도를 계속 믿는다면 우리는 그의 집에 속합니다.

sentences.original_text: We must continue to show people clearly that we trust God.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 사람들에게 하나님을 신뢰한다는 것을 계속 명확히 보여주어야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: He will do what he has promised to do.
